Html: Are these implemented anywhere in the main part of the program, or do these need to be implemented per model?
They are a part of the buffs system.  Professions currently aren't a part of the character class so the user has to check the correct ones themselves.
Skinning and Mining are implemented, they're buffs. Herbalism will be coming in Rawr 2.2, hopefully.
What about Mixology, from Alchemy?  That should be pretty easy to model.  It's a straight buff to Elixirs/Flasks.
